content:
Hello,

I have a small problem with the installation of Isabelle. I get this message when I open it :

C:\Users\hamza\.isabelle\Isabelle2021-1\jedit\jars\isabelle_jedit_main.jar:
Cannot start:
*** Duplicate declaration of option "browser_info" (line 5 of "/cygdrive/c/Users/hamza/.isabelle/Isabelle2021-1/etc/options") (line 5 of "/cygdrive/c/Users/hamza/.isabelle/Isabelle2021-1/etc/options") (file "/cygdrive/c/Users/hamza/.isabelle/Isabelle2021-1/etc/options")

Do you know what is going on ?

Thank you very much
Hi @Hamza M, did you find the solution to this problem? A student of mine is trying to install isabelle on windows and has encontered the same issue.
If anyone else has a suggestion, let me know.
I am surprised that you have an .isabelle/Isabelle2021-1/etc/options. What is in that file?

We found the issue. It was simply a problem of missing dependencies. After installing MikTek and reinstalling isabelle, there is no longer this option file and Isabelle is running as wanted. :octopus:
Can you mark the stream as solved with a checkmark? I can't modify the title.
Oh cool thank you for the solution. I just switched to my Linux PC to make it work
Hamza M has marked this topic as resolved.
